home.introContent1: Blockchain Global Day: IMMERSE INTO THE INFINITE GAMETECH WORLD
home.introContent2: The opportunity to experience a multitude of Game, immerse yourself into the high-tech space with hundreds of blockchain projects. Update the latest industry news from top experts. Participate in activities within the framework of the event with huge rewards.
home.boothsContent: Step into the Infinite Gametech World by joining our booth.
home.agendaContent: Follow Agenda so as not to miss any interesting programs and useful information.

list.contentDefiPet: My DeFi Pet is a virtual pet game that combines DeFi, collectability and your own personality.
list.contentOnlySport: Oly Sport is The World's first horse racing metaverse game for players to earn virtual land and real land in game.
list.contentSpaceCrypto: Space Crypto is the Space Metaverse, where anyone can earn tokens through skilled, strategic gameplay and contribute to the Space Metaverse ecosystem
list.contentThetan: Thetan Arena is an E-sport game based on blockchain technology. You can gather your friends, form a team, battle with others and earn money with just your skills.
list.content9dNft: 9D NFT is the first 9D Martial Art/Metaverse NFT game in SEA, built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) platform.
